snippet: MEYERHOFF--Erich, born 1919 in Braunschweig Germany, died of heart failure on December 26, 2015 in New York City. He was admired, respected, and loved by colleagues, family, and friends. In lieu of flowers, donations to The Socialist Party USA www.tinyurl.com/p5334n6 or The Medical Library Association Scholarship Fund www.tinyurl.com/z5vzk36 will be appreciated. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MEYERHOFF--Erich, born 1919 in Braunschweig Germany, died of heart failure on December 26, 2015 in New York City. He was admired, respected, and loved by colleagues, family, and friends. In lieu of flowers, donations to The Socialist Party USA www.tinyurl.com/p5334n6 or The Medical Library Association Scholarship Fund www.tinyurl.com/z5vzk36 will be appreciated. 1/3
